sentences.en: a man’s watch
sentences.cn: 男式手表

sentences.en: A young man plunged from a sheer rock face to his death.
sentences.cn: 一名男青年从陡峭的岩壁上坠崖身亡。

sentences.en: All men are equal in the eyes of the law.
sentences.cn: 法律面前人人平等。

sentences.en: As a player he was unselfish, a true team man.
sentences.cn: 作为一名选手，他毫无私念，真正把自己摆在团队中。

sentences.en: Billy Sullivan had impressed me as a fine man.
sentences.cn: 比利·沙利文给我留下的印象是他是个很不错的人。

sentences.en: Don’t keep Hansen waiting – he’s a busy man.
sentences.cn: 别让汉森老等着——他可是个大忙人。

sentences.en: for any colouring and perming services, David's your man.
sentences.cn: 只要是染发和烫发，戴维是你的最佳人选。

sentences.en: full speed ahead and the devil take the hindmost.
sentences.cn: 全速前进，落后者倒霉。

sentences.en: He called me to his office for a man-to-man talk.
sentences.cn: 他把我叫到他的办公室私下谈了谈。

sentences.en: He could just about see the little man behind the counter.
sentences.cn: 他勉强能看到柜台后面的小个子男人。

sentences.en: he had been his eyes and ears in the community, voiced the opinions of the man in the street.
sentences.cn: 在社区中他是他的耳目，谈出普通人的见解。

sentences.en: he had been his eyes and ears in the community, voiced the opinions of the man in the street.
sentences.cn: 在社区中他是他的耳目，谈出普通人的见解。

sentences.en: he has not been man enough to face up to his responsibilities.
sentences.cn: 他没有足够的勇气来面对自己要负的责任。

sentences.en: He then held the man in an armlock until police arrived.
sentences.cn: 然后他反扭住那名男子的手臂让他动弹不得，直到警察赶到。

sentences.en: He was a huge man, built like an oak tree.
sentences.cn: 他是个大块头，结实得像棵橡树。

sentences.en: He was a stern critic but an extremely kindly man.
sentences.cn: 他是个苛刻的批评家，但却是个非常善良的人。

sentences.en: He was a tall, thin man with grey hair.
sentences.cn: 他是个瘦高个，头发灰白。

sentences.en: He’s a very kind man.
sentences.cn: 他是个非常和蔼的人。

sentences.en: I make men out of them and teach them never to let anyone outsmart them.
sentences.cn: 我帮他们走向成熟并教导他们绝不要败给任何人。

sentences.en: I stared at the man, couldn't tear my eyes away.
sentences.cn: 我盯着那个人看，视线无法移开。

sentences.en: I'm as ambitious as the next man.
sentences.cn: 我像其他人一样有抱负。

sentences.en: in previous student flats she'd shared, it was every man for himself.
sentences.cn: 在她以前住过的学生公寓里，大家都自己顾自己。

sentences.en: Now let me see, who's the man we want?
sentences.cn: 现在让我看一看，谁是我们要找的人？

sentences.en: the evolution of man
sentences.cn: 人类的进化

sentences.en: The man took her suitcase from her and then searched her.
sentences.cn: 那名男子拿过她手中的提箱，然后对她搜身。

sentences.en: The man was known to the police because of previous convictions.
sentences.cn: 因为有犯罪前科，警察们都认识这个人。

sentences.en: the time when families worked in the fields man and boy.
sentences.cn: 家家户户终生忙碌于田间的年代。

sentences.en: There was no doubting the animal magnetism of the man.
sentences.cn: 毫无疑问，这个男人身上透着一种野性魅力。

sentences.en: There were two men and a woman in the car.
sentences.cn: 车上有两男一女。

sentences.en: They had alienated the one man who knew the business.
sentences.cn: 他们弄僵了同那个唯一懂行的人之间的关系。

sentences.en: This is one of the worst diseases known to man.
sentences.cn: 这是人类已知最严重的疾病之一。

phrases.phrase: be man enough to do (或 for)
every man for himself and the devil take the hindm
phrases.tran_cn: (谚)各人自己照管自己，自顾自

phrases.phrase: make a man out of someone
phrases.tran_cn: （经历或人）使某人成熟，使某人长大成人
新派男子（分担家务及照顾子女的工作）
没有人；[口]老喜欢唱反调的人（等于no-man）
真正的男人（电视剧名称）；大丈夫
得力助手，不可或缺的帮手

trans.tran_cn: 喂，嘿，啊呀〔用于强调正在说的话，尤在生气、吃惊、失望等时使用〕
在〔某系统、设备等上〕工作；使用，操纵〔某系统、设备等〕
trans.tran_en: to work at, use, or ope-rate a system, piece of equipment etc

trans.tran_cn: 使振作，操纵，给…配置人员，在…就位
